name: Release v0.20.0
body:
## What's Changed
* chore: update README.md for v0.19.1 by @auth-for-create-pull-request in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/240
* feat: support local Bazel binaries using `bazel_binaries.local()` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/241


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.19.1...v0.20.0

## Bazel Module Snippet

```python
bazel_dep(
    name = "rules_bazel_integration_test",
    version = "0.20.0",
    dev_dependency = True,
)
```

## Workspace Snippet

```python
http_archive(
    name = "rules_bazel_integration_test",
    sha256 = "6e65d497c68f5794349bfa004369e144063686ce1ebd0227717cd23285be45ef",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/releases/download/v0.20.0/rules_bazel_integration_test.v0.20.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@rules_bazel_integration_test//bazel_integration_test:deps.bzl", "bazel_integration_test_rules_dependencies")

bazel_integration_test_rules_dependencies()

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

* chore(deps): update dependency rules_swift_package_manager to v0.12.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/215

* chore(deps): update dependency platforms to v0.0.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/222

name: Release v0.16.1
body:

* chore: remove legacy WORKSPACE in root module by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/188

name: Release v0.16.0
body:
## What's Changed
* chore: update README.md for v0.15.1 by @auth-for-create-pull-request in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/179
* Use a default for current version when none is specified. by @katre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/180
* Export runfiles environment for non-Windows tests. by @katre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/183
* Use bazelisk to download bazels for tests, instead of trying to download by @katre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/181
* chore(deps): upgrade `cgrindel_bazel_starlib` to 0.17.0 by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/186
* chore(deps): update dependency apple/swift-argument-parser to from: "1.2.3" by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/177


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.15.1...v0.16.0

## Bazel Module Snippet

```python

)
```

name: Release v0.15.1
body:
## What's Changed
* chore: update README.md for v0.15.0 by @auth-for-create-pull-request in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/162
* chore(deps): update dependency platforms to v0.0.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/163
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/164
* chore: apply recommended Renovate config for rulesets by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/165
* chore: ensure that a pull request only has one running CI workflow by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/166
* chore(deps): update dependency build_bazel_rules_swift to v1.9.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/170
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_swift_package_manager to v0.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/173
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_swift to v1.9.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/172
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.32.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/171
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/169
* chore(deps): update dependency platforms to v0.0.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/168
* chore(deps): update dependency apple/swift-argument-parser to from: "1.2.2" by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/167
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/157
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/174
* Enable passing tags, visibility, etc to script_test. by @katre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/178


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.15.0...v0.15.1

name: Release v0.14.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.13.0 by @auth-for-create-pull-request in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/151
* update_deleted_packages: filter out bazelignored directories by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/154


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.13.0...v0.14.0

## Bazel Module Snippet

name: Release v0.13.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.12.0 by @auth-for-create-pull-request in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/143
* chore: update `README.md` with bzlmod instructions by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/142
* Allow passing data to a bazel_integration_test by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/145
* Support bazel binaries which aren't called bazel by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/147
* fix: typo in module snippet comment by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/148
* chore: enable `custom_test_runner` example by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/149
* chore: add `dev_dependency` to module snippet by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/150
* Absolutify $(rootpath) env vars by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/146

## New Contributors
* @illicitonion made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/145

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.12.0...v0.13.0

```python
)
```

body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.10.3 by @auth-for-create-pull-request in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/115
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/105
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.18.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/104

* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/118

name: Release v0.9.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.8.0 by @auth-for-create-pull-request in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/68
* Add env parameter to bazel_integration_test, remove "CC" passing by @k1nkreet in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/71
* Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/73
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/77
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/78
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/75
* chore(deps): update dependency cgrindel_bazel_starlib to v0.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/74
* fix: address issues running `find_child_workspace_packages.sh` with empty child workspaces by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/81
* fix: apply suggestions from GH081 code review and address ShellCheck warnings by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/83
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/80
* chore(deps): update dependency cgrindel_bazel_starlib to v0.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/79
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/88
* chore(deps): update dependency cgrindel_bazel_starlib to v0.9.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/87
* fix: the SHA256 for rules_python 0.15.0 was wrong or changed by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/89
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.15.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/90
* chore: additional cleanup for find_child_workspace_packages by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/84
* feat: add `remove_child_wksp_bazel_symlinks` to remove child workspace symlinks by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/91

## New Contributors
* @k1nkreet made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/71
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/73

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python
    name = "contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test",
    sha256 = "20d670bb614d311a2a0fc8af53760439214731c3d5be2d9b0a197dccc19583f5",
    strip_prefix = "rules_bazel_integration_test-0.9.0",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/archive/v0.9.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release v0.6.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for 0.6.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/46
* Renamed the workspace to `bazel_contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/48
* Removed `bazel_` prefix from the workspace name. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/51
* Updated Bazel versions. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/52
* Disable the custom_test_runner_test until the Xcode build problem is fixed. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/54
* Update documentation for custom test runners. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/53
* Upgraded rules_spm to address failing Swift custom test runner. Also, upgraded Bazel versions. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/55


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/0.6.0...v0.6.1

## Workspace Snippet

```python
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test",
    sha256 = "6057e4ae6d1c80c129877d11c61b1fee1c05bb24334d0ab1810ce3ecdf24abf4",
    strip_prefix = "rules_bazel_integration_test-0.6.1",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_bazel_integration_test/archive/v0.6.1.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test//bazel_integration_test:deps.bzl", "bazel_integration_test_rules_dependencies")

bazel_integration_test_rules_dependencies()

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release 0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update REAMDE.md for v0.5.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/36
* Update to use native `bazel_binaries`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/37
* Refactored builds to common actions and added scheduled builds workflow by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/38
* Removed scheduled_builds.yml. Added schedule to ci.yml. Updated badge. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/39
* Updated workflow name to Continuous Integration. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/40
* Upgraded to bazel-starlib 0.6.0, added rules_python, and addressed Buildifier lint issues. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/41
* Fixed failing custom_test_runner test. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/42
* Allow `env_inherit` values to be added or overridden. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/45


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.5.0...0.6.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python

    name = "cgrindel_rules_bazel_integration_test",

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")
```

name: Release v0.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update REAMDE.md for v0.4.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/30
* Add support dynamic workspaces. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/33
* Implement python test runner by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/34
* Upgraded to Bazel 5.0.0. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/35

## New Contributors
* @cgrindel-app-token-generator made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/30

name: Release v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Updated README.md with release 0.3.1 download info. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/19
* Update rules_bzlformat to 0.2.1 by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/22
* Migrate from `rules_bzlformat`, `rules_updatesrc`, and `bazel_shlib` to `bazel-starlib` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/23
* Update repo to best practices by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/25
* Migrated `bazel_binaries` functionality and removed dependency on bazel-integration-testing.  by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/27
* Implement release workflow. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/28


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0

```python

    ],

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release 0.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fixed issue with `create_scratch_dir` where hidden files were not being copied properly by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/18


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

name: Release 0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Moved the test files in the tools package to tests/tools_tests. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/14
* Add support for custom test runners  by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/15


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: Release 0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Updated README.md for release 0.1.1. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/6
* Added `sh_deps` and `sh_data` to `bazel_integration_test` to support additional execution scenarios by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/8
* Add `create_scratch_dir` utility to tools by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/pull/12


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/rules_bazel_integration_test/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0
